overview: It's always been said that private school girls are the naughtiest doe to the strict and rigid curriculum they are placed in. After watching this movie you'll see that adage is true. An all star cast of young hotties come together for the final school bus ride of the year and break all the rules. Summer time is here and these girls flowers are blooming as they let loose fucking teachers, counselors and even school bug driver. No cock is left ubdrained.
tagline: Don't be late for the bus!! Especially the one carrying these sluts to school!
title: Bus Stop Girls
